testcase.name: Task12
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to homePage.................................................passed Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed And Click 'Products' button.................................................passed Then user scrolls down the page.............................................passed And Hover over "first" product and click Add to cart........................passed And Click 'Continue Shopping' button........................................passed And Hover over "second" product and click Add to cart.......................passed And Click 'View Cart' button................................................passed Then Verify both products are added to Cart.................................passed Then Verify their prices, quantity and total price..........................passed
